channel.title: Comments on: Day 39 – A Good Night’s Sleep Made a Better Mother’s Day – Sunday, May 14

item.title: By: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.dc:creator: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.description: Good morning Sue, It sounds like you have had a busy few days. Please relax now and believe that each day will be better than the last. I have a clear schedule for Thursday . I will ask Kim to decide if it will be good for me to come to be with you. I plan to be out to you in the early afternoon and I can stay as long as you like. I can't wait to see you again. Have a restful night tonight. Love, Debbie
item.content:encoded:
Good morning Sue,
It sounds like you have had a busy few days. Please relax now and believe that each day will be better than the last. I have a clear schedule for Thursday . I will ask Kim to decide if it will be good for me to come to be with you. I plan to be out to you in the early afternoon and I can stay as long as you like. I can’t wait to see you again.
Have a restful night tonight. Love, Debbie
